forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
